name: xThemeSong
overview: Download theme songs from YouTube or upload custom MP3s for your media library
description: A plugin that automatically downloads theme songs from YouTube by user provided video ID/URL or allows uploading custom MP3 files. Features complete Web UI with drag-and-drop upload, audio player for existing themes, and loading animations.
changelog: v1.0.0: Major release with improved UI - loading animations, modal success/error messages, existing theme song player. Cross-platform FFmpeg detection. YoutubeExplode 6.5.6.
